content.prompt: Which statement best characterizes lines 1-4 (“Thy...hand”)?

choices.label: Classical allusions set the tone for the poem.
Strong assertions announce a challenge to other poets.
Elevated diction evokes the splendor and power of the poem’s subject.
Heroic couplets accentuate the poem’s frivolous subject matter.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain the function of specific words and phrases in a text.
